Description of incident: A civilian employee of the department's            pension fund is accused of stealing eight tapes containing the Social            Security numbers and direct-deposit information for 80,000 current and            retired cops. The employee, who served as the pension fund's director            of communications, has been charged with computer trespass, burglary            and grand larceny. He is accused of removing the tapes from a backup            data warehouse on Staten Island after disabling security cameras. Police            found the missing tapes at his home before arresting him.
